name: doewah
description: DigitalOcean Workstation for Executing Automated Helpers

scripts.app:ship: npm run app:build && npm run app:publish
scripts.droplet:deploy: source .env && ssh -i $DROPLET_SSH_KEY root@$DROPLET_IP 'cd /root/doewah && git pull && systemctl restart claude-bot && systemctl restart doewah-updates'
scripts.droplet:status: source .env && ssh -i $DROPLET_SSH_KEY root@$DROPLET_IP 'systemctl status claude-bot doewah-updates'

author: jaslr
